pages.text: $(thing)Drikwings$() are a subclass of $(thing)Djinni$() that are known to be amicable towards humans. They usually take the shape of a dark blue and purple parrot. Drikwings will provide their owner with limited flight abilities when nearby.

To obtain the parrot or parrot familiar for the sacrifice, consider summoning them using either the $(l:rituals/summoning/summon_wild_parrot)Wild Parrot Ritual$(/l) or $(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_parrot)Parrot Familiar Ritual$(/l). $(bold)Hint:$() If you use mods that protect pets from death, use the wild parrot ritual!
